description: External Advisory Services for the Special Handling Unit (SHU) National Advisory Committee (NAC)
full_summary:
**External Advisory Services - Special Handling Unit (SHU) National Advisory Committee (NAC)**

**Tender Reference**: cb-901-23116013  
**Solicitation Reference**: 21120-24-4680057/A  
**Tender Closing Date**: June 6, 2024, 2:00 PM (ET)  
**Expected Contract Start Date**: January 1, 2025  
**Expected Contract End Date**: December 31, 2025  
**Procurement Category**: SRV  
**Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding  
**Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price  
**Trade Agreements**: None  
**Regions of Opportunity**: All provinces and territories in Canada  
**Regions of Delivery**: Quebec (except National Capital Region)  
**Contact Information**:  
  Nassima Aliouat  
 Phone: (343) 540-8957  
 Email: [nassima.aliouat@csc-scc.gc.ca](mailto:nassima.aliouat@csc-scc.gc.ca)

**Request for Proposal Description:**

The Correctional Service of Canada (CSC), Quebec Region, is seeking an external advisor to serve as a member of the SHU NAC. The SHU NAC's purpose is to make recommendations to the Senior Deputy Commissioner regarding the admission, maintenance, or transfer of inmates to and from the SHU.

**Key Deliverable:**

The external advisor's resource must provide verbal recommendations to the Senior Deputy Commissioner. This contract includes security requirements.

**Duration and Time Frame:**

The contract period will be one year, with the option to renew for three additional one-year periods.

**Additional Information:**

Please visit the Canada Buys website for the complete solicitation document and associated information.
After contract award, interested suppliers can request a debriefing on the bid solicitation process.

**Notes for Suppliers:**
We reserves the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.
